page.title: 04Building materials Gt Orton
page.content:
Sandstone and bricks are the materials used in the homes of the village. But some of the older cottages, still have inner walls of a clay-daubing mixture. Large slates roof the older houses but tiles the more modern buildings. The sandstone would have come from a quarry some miles west of the village.
A local building firm is often involved with the construction of new homes and the repairing of existing buildings. Until recently there was a joiner living here who was also involved in much of the local work, but he recently retired and left the area.
